document_data.name: Vlorn Keenear
document_data.mainbody: '''Vlorn Keenear''' was a sage who was extremely knowledgeable about [[halfling]] folklore and [[human]] politics of the [[Sword Coast]]. He was especially astute when it came to the nobility of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Personality: Vlorn was known to frequently make sarcastic remarks in jest, even when working with a client.
document_data.History: Vlorn arrived in Waterdeep sometime around [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Vlorn spent much of his time at the [[Grinning Lion]].
